title: WHERE DOES FASCINATION COME FROM? / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS Q&A WITH DR. PARET
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will answer the question "Where does hypnosis come from?". He will share some of the most interesting secrets around non-verbal hypnosis. The hypnotic inductions in the video are from Dr. Paret's masterclass all around the world. His students are learning the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques, that come from the ancient times and can't be find in books. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
